content: worked from the top down and in the round this knit sweater features 2 colors of our self-striping caron macchiato cakes practice a variety of techniques like cast on knit purl short row neck shaping and raglan sleeve increases you ll love the basic silhouette on this seamless garment with very minimal finishing the pattern is offered in a range of sizes to complement a variety of body types to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished chest xs/s 42 106 5 cm m 46 117 cm l 50 127 cm xl 54 137 cm 2/3xl 48 147 cm 4/5xl 68 172 5 cm
